screenshots.caption: OPD waiting Queue panel for doctors

name: Hospital & Pharmacy management system
short_description:
NEW VERSION AVAILABLE AT:-
https://sourceforge.net/projects/elhmas/

A php/ MySQL, fledged web application, that is being used in many medi-care services, to manage the hospitals various task and integrate that task to pharmacy deptt.
This web application is upgraded to version 3.1

For FREE Online Demo Visit:-
http://techdynamics.org/hpms.php

For codes or demo login:-

Do mail at saba.wasim.it@gmail.com 

Change log:-
1.token system for waiting patients at each OPD.
2.Enhanced Security (user, attendant and doctors).
3.auto generated patient queues for each doctors.

Some services are:- 
1. patient reg.
2.patient History ( incl every visit of each patient)
3. patient management and stats 
3.doctors history
4.doctors reg.
5.doctors management and stats.
6.hospital income, expenses etc.
7. Pharmacy management and stats 
8. medicine reg.
9. medicine stocks stats
10. (IMPORTANT !) medicine real time usage by patient given by doctors
summary: A hospital and pharmacy integrated management and billing system
